Job Description: Implement major fullstack features     Demonstrate a passion for SaaS product development     Take full ownership of the code you write from designing to developing to maintaining your modules       Requirements   software product development experience     - Experience developing full-stack SaaS software products     - Expertise developing SOA web services and REST / OData based APIs     - Expertise with IoC containers and DI frameworks (like Autofac), SOLID and DRY principles, REST frameworks, ORMs (like Entity Framework), CD/CD solutions using Maven, TeamCity etc.         - Deep expertise in object oriented programming, preferably in .NET Core and .NET based frameworks     - Hands-on experience working with RDBMS like SQL Server or PostgreSQL with knowledge of writing efficient and performant queries and designing data models.         - Hands-on experience developing front-end for web applications using Angular 6 , HTML, Javascript, CSS, etc.
